lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's finally time for the Froggo Donut Special!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: The one time of the year that they replace their mint green frosting with normal green-colored chocolate...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's the ultimate frog-shaped donut!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Now to buy as many as I can afford!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: NOOOOOOOO! THEY'RE OUT? WHAT MONSTER STOLE MY FROGGO SPECIALS?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait... That cop just bought the last one!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: !! Locke?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Fedelynn?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I haven't seen you in a while, I thought you were avoiding me.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Somehow, I didn't peg you as the donut-eating type. Isn't that way too stereotypical?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Donuts are convenient fuel for a mom on the job!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: And sometimes I need to treat myself...

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: And it's the Froggo Donut Special...

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: And now I sound like you, don't I.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Kinda.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (At least she seems to be doing okay...)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But a whole baker's dozen? Couldn't you leave some for a hungry detective?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Fine, I'll be the adult.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Would you like one?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I mean, I would like three...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But I'll take it!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Anyway, you seem different today.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Less... terrifying?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I'm on break. Even I need breaks.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: In the middle of the day, still dressed in your uniform?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...So you still aren't going to tell me anything, huh?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I did some research on Deuce Evidens.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: He's the police chief, AND the DA? Is that even remotely legal?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: ...I should've known you wouldn't let that go.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'm trying to help you here!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: And I'm trying to protect you!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You keep saying that, but I'm not a kid! I'm a professional, and I know what I'm getting myself into.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Okay...

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I'm not on break. I'm on patrol.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Patrolling Froggo Donuts?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I'm not patrolling anything. I'm just "on patrol".

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: How is that possible?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: ...Deuce and I always butted heads, even when he was just the police chief, but things got worse after he became the DA.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I'm good at what I do, and I follow the rules, so he never had anything on me.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: But then he tried to force me to give up the crime scene at the alleyway to one of his right hand men.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: That's why you sent me in to monitor the place...

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Yes. Deuce's men would have recognized Keyna immediately, and I knew there was something there that he needed.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: They must have been pretty desperate to raid the scene like that.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: They didn't find it though. You did.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: That flash drive you found contains proof that Deuce bribed or blackmailed more than just a few officials to get his positions.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: The suspect was gathering dirt on Deuce. As a result, Deuce found out and had him arrested.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You have proof that he's evil! Why don't you take him to court?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: It's not that simple. The evidence was obtained illegaly, so it would be thrown out in court.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Deuce being the DA doesn't help the matter...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...Heck it to all.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Also, now that Deuce knows I'm on to him, things have gotten difficult for me down at the station.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: He gave someone else my office, and keeps assigning me to patrol areas of little to no consequence.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: All of my friends at the department are too scared to stand up for me.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: He's trying to force you to resign...

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Yes. And I'm sure he'll use the fact that I hired you to increase the pressure.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I'm just trying to do what's right for the city and my son.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Then why not do everything you can to bring Deuce Evidens to justice?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: ...If I get fired and lose my income, I could lose custody of my son.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...I understand why you needed those donuts now.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Being a single parent is hard, even without all of this going on.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: This is a way more serious situation than I usually deal with, but I want to help you.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Even though you scare me sometimes, and you get in the way of my investigations, I've always respected your commitment to doing the right thing.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You're what a police officer SHOULD be.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I only get in the way of your investigations when you're somewhere you shouldn't be.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Regardless, with the two of us together, there's no way we can't take Deuce Evidens down!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: We do still have the evidence... Maybe there is something we can do.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Alright, initiating WONDER ZONE: FULLL DIVE. START!
